snippet: Males of a certain sparrow species will help their neighbors fend off intruders, but only under certain conditions.
abstract: Sarah Goodwin study in journal Biology Letters finds that male sparrows will welcome weaker males into their territory, and that quality of bird's trill is indicator of aggression.
lead_paragraph: Males of a certain sparrow species will help their neighbors fend off intruders, but only under certain conditions.

headline.print_headline: Animal Behavior: Wimpy Sparrows Welcome Here
